choose_departure.eng: Enter the city you're flying from (Example: Bangkok)

didnt_understand.eng: I didn't understand, please enter the city name again

didnt_understand2.eng: Didn't understand, choose a city from the menu

choose_from_list_departure.eng: Choose from the list where you are departing from

choose_arrive.eng: Enter the city you're flying to (Example: Rome)

choose_from_list_arrive.eng: Choose from the list where you are flying

choose_departure_dates.eng: Choose the dates you want to fly (select multiple to find the cheapest ticket)
